HEADLINE: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that an investors/analyst conference call on the unaudited financial results of the Company for the first quarter ended June 30, 2020 is scheduled on Friday,                            August 07, 2020 at 10:30 A.M (IST).

The same will also be uploaded on Company''s website: www.dalmiabharat.com.

We request you to please take the same on record.
